text: Aviad Gizbar, the owner of Hummus Eliyahu restaurant at the Eli gas station, stopped the Summary by Arutz Sheva terrorist attack in which 2 Israelis were murdered. 3 Articles 3 Articles All Left Center Right [] The Daily Caller Hummus Vs.
